creator: ushakov@int.com.ru
text:
It would be nice to make jakarta-regexp-1.2.jar available to servlets (move it 
from server\lib to common\lib\)

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This library is not needed by any user components or any example component in 
the Tomcat distribution, so it will stay by default in the server loader. You 
can easily move it to the common loader without causing any trouble.
